author: Madeline Holcombe, CNN
title: The US hit the grim milestone of most fatalities recorded in one day as health officials warned social distancing is now more important than ever
description: The US reached a grim milestone with the highest number of coronavirus-related deaths reported in one day, and officials are warning the next two weeks will be crucial in the fight to stop the spread.
content:
(CNN)The US reached a grim milestone with the highest number of coronavirus-related deaths reported in one day, and officials are warning the next two weeks will be crucial in the fight to stop the spread.
